name: Modi vs Corona
description:
Hey Everyone, This game supports all versions 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to the game!!!!

"Modi vs Corona" is a simple and free space shooter inspired game where objective is to protect the main player from the virus.It challenges your reflexes as you need to dodge and jump over the viruses.

CONTROLS :::::

Move the character with help of Arrow Keys.

Fire Antidote(s) with the help of "F" key.

GOAL :::::

Save the Character from the virus as long as you can.

GAMEPLAY ::::::

Taking hits from the virus will make you go down.
